description: HadCM2 is an early family of Met Office Hadley Centre coupled climate models that established foundational approaches for UK climate modeling.
shared_code_base: HadCM2 family members share common atmospheric and oceanic model components developed at the Met Office.
common_scientific_basis: Common scientific approach based on primitive equation atmospheric and oceanic dynamics.
variation_dimensions: Resolution configurations, parameter tuning, physics parameterization choices, domain configurations.
evolution: HadCM2 developed in the mid-1990s, served as foundation for HadCM3 and HadGEM families.
software_dependencies: Standard numerical libraries, basic I/O libraries, message passing libraries
computational_requirements: 10s to 100s of processors for climate simulations
